How are these rankings created?

Rankings are created using data-based review technology that analyzes publicly available product information, review trends, and availability. Each list follows the same evaluation criteria to ensure fair comparisons.

Is this air fryer big enough for a family?

It lists a capacity of 4 Quarts, which can work for family-size portions depending on what you cook.

How well does this air fryer crisp food?

It uses 1550 Watts, which supports steady heat for crisping.
